name: Toyquake
description:
22nd most fun!

Play as the Red, the valiant knight from the LD31 entry "Like a Boss"! The Heathen Trickster Wizard is at it again, but instead of raining blocks from the sky, 'tis the very floor you walk upon itself that he toys with!

Go back and forth, grabbing as much treasure as possible, but beware! As you run, the wizard will throw earthquake bombs which cause collapses, and after every coin you get, the wizard shall wave his wand and shake the world once more!

"This is great. Really. By far the most fun [Ludum Dare 35 entry] I've played of yet" - LD 35 participant

I wouldn't reccommend spending any money on this game, though. Unless you have, like, infinite money.
